# logistic

```{r  echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, cache=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.align="center", echo=FALSE, fig.show = "hold")

```

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

set.seed(123)

dataset <- cbind(x1 = rnorm(100), x2 = rnorm(100))
dataset_logistic <- as_tibble(dataset) %>% 
 mutate(y = ifelse(x1 >= x2, "A", "B"))

```

```{r}

ggplot(dataset_logistic, aes(x1, x2, color = y)) + geom_point()

```

```{r}

dataset_knn <- as_tibble(dataset) %>% 
 mutate(y = ifelse(x1 >= x2^2, "A", "B"))

```


```{r}

ggplot(dataset_knn, aes(x1, x2, color = y)) + geom_point()

```
